description: Physicists have identified a loophole in Heisenberg’s uncertainty principle that allows simultaneous measurement of a particle’s position and momentum in modular form. The approach, demonstrated with trapped ions, avoids breaking the principle itself while promising advances in quantum sensors, navigation systems, and precision clocks.
title: Physicists Identify Loophole in Heisenberg’s Uncertainty Principle While Preserving Its Validity

description: Qualcomm's Nitin Kumar, VP Product Management - Snapdragon Chipset, talks about X2 Elite, the next-gen laptop chip, highlighting improved performance, AI capabilities, and enhanced power efficiency. The Snapdragon X2 Elite was announced during the Snapdragon Summit in Hawaii. The second-generation processor also includes Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme. The laptops powered by the new chips will be available in 2026
title: Qualcomm on How Snapdragon X2 Elite Will Shake Up the Laptop Market

description: SpaceX has successfully launched its Falcon 9 rocket, which carried 11-20 Starlink Satellites into space. The lift-off was done from the Vandenberg Space Force Base, California, wherein the rocket entered space within a few minutes of the launch.
title: SpaceX’s Falcon 9 Lifts Off Successfully From Vandenberg Space Force Base

description: How to Train Your Dragon is all set to land on your digital screens. The movie explores themes of friendship, emotions, perception, and more.
title: How To Train Your Dragon OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Live Action Movie Online?

description: As the ISS nears retirement in 2030, NASA’s contract changes cast doubt on Sierra Space’s Dream Chaser visiting the station. With increasing competition and tight deadlines, the spaceplane’s long-anticipated shuttle-style mission may remain only a vision.
title: NASA Faces Uncertainty Over Space Plane Missions to ISS Before Its Deorbit

description: SpaceX launched 28 Starlink V2 Mini satellites Sept. 21, 2025, from Florida. The Falcon 9’s first stage, on its 11th mission, landed on a drone ship. This was SpaceX’s 119th launch of the year, further expanding its Starlink mega-constellation to over 8,000 active satellites in orbit.
title: SpaceX Falcon 9 Deploys 28 Next-Generation Starlink V2 Mini Satellites

description: Twisted Metal Season 2 has now landed on the digital screens. The season is streaming on SonyLIV and stars Anthony Mackie in the lead role.
title: Twisted Metal Season 2 Now Streaming on Sony LIV: Know Everything about Plot, Cast, and More

description: Written by Aditya Chopra, War 2 is an action-thriller movie starring Hrithik Roshan, Jr. NTR., and Kiara Advani in the lead roles. The movie will stream soon on Netflix.
title: War 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch To Watch Hrithik Roshan Starrer Action Movie

description: Priced at Rs. 1,799, the OnePlus Nord Buds 3r is the company’s most affordable TWS offering. It manages to get the basics right, with its functional design, decent audio quality, and a lasting battery life. However, there are a few major trade-offs, such as the lack of ANC and wear detection. Thus, what you gain in endurance and comfort, you lose in audio quality and features.
title: OnePlus Nord Buds 3r Review: How Much Bass is Too Much Bass?

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025, which began on September 23, has been offering discounts on smartphones, laptops, and more. Home appliances have also emerged as a popular category, with deals on smart TVs, refrigerators, and washing machines. Those looking to upgrade to a five-star energy-efficient washing machine can find lucrative offers during the ongoing sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Discounts on 5-Star Rated Washing Machines

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 commenced in India last week. The sale brings offers on security cameras. Brands like CP Plus, TP-Link, and Qubo are offering huge discounts on their latest models. Besides the general price cut, shoppers can get bank-based discounts and exchange offers to sweeten their purchases.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Security Cameras With Up to 85 Percent Discount During the Great Indian Festival Sale

description: EA's deal would be the largest leveraged buyout on record, eclipsing TXU Energy's 2007 takeover and other landmark transactions of that decade, including Toys "R" Us and Hertz, and comes amid a rebound in global dealmaking as easing borrowing costs revive appetite for mega-transactions.
title: Battlefield Maker Electronic Arts to Go Private in Record $55 Billion Leveraged Buyout

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 entered its seventh day on Monday, offering discounts across smartphones, laptops, TVs, and more. The sale is also a good time to upgrade audio gear, with deals on OnePlus Nord Buds 3, Realme Earbuds Air 7, and Sony WH-CH520. Shoppers can additionally avail of bank offers and no-cost EMI.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on Wireless Earphones Including OnePlus Nord Buds 3, Realme Earbuds Air 7 and Sony WH-CH520

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is now in its second week. The US-based e-commerce platform has announced that more than 3.80 crore users visited the platform in the first 48 hours. About 70 percent of these website visits came from India's nine metropolitan cities, the company claims. Although the company has yet to announce the exact date when the sale event will end, it has highlighted that the sale will continue till Diwali.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Deals on AI Productivity Laptops From Asus, HP, Lenovo, Dell and Other Brands

description: With the festive season around the corner, now is a great time to upgrade your home appliances. The ongoing Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 brings major discounts on a wide range of refrigerators. Top brands like LG, Samsung, and Panasonic are offering up to 65 percent off on different models. Buyers can also get additional savings on their purchases by applying bank offers and coupon-based discounts.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Offers on Double-Door Refrigerators From Brands Like Samsung, Haier and LG

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 began on September 23 for everyone. The Prime subscribers got 24-hour early access to the sale event, allowing them to grab the best deals before others. Although the company has yet to reveal when the sale event will conclude, the date could be approaching soon, as it has entered the second week. While it is live, customers can get the best offers on electronics such as phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Deals on 65-Inch Smart TVs From Sony, TCL, Samsung and More

description: If a simple laptop for casual browsing, college, or office usage is what’s on your wish list, then our latest article, comprising the top deals on laptops under Rs. 60,000, might come to your aid and help you make an informed buying decision. Apart from direct price cuts, customers can avail of an instant bank discount of up to Rs. 10,000 on SBI Credit Card full swipe and Credit Card EMI transactions. There are no-cost EMI and Amazon Pay-based offers too.
title: Amazon Sale: Top Deals on Laptops From Asus, Acer, Dell and More Under Rs. 60,000

description: Canva AI, the company’s suite of artificial intelligence (AI) tools, has expanded support to 16 new languages, including Hindi, Arabic, Chinese, and Spanish. Users can now write prompts and receive outputs in their native languages. The update also adds support for 31 locales, allowing more culturally relevant and context-aware designs across regions.
title: Canva AI Assistant Expanded to 16 New Languages Including Chinese, Hindi and Spanish

description: CMF Headphone Pro wireless headphones have been launched in select markets as the first over-ear headphones from the company. The latest addition to the company's audio portfolio comes in three colour options and features 40mm drivers. They offer active noise cancellation (ANC). They support the LDAC codec and offer Hi-Res audio playback.
title: CMF Headphone Pro Launched With Energy Slider, Up to 100 Hours of Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025, which commenced on September 23, is in full swing. During the sale event, the company is offering various electronics like smart TVs, phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops. Now, the e-commerce giant has announced the date on which its ongoing sale will conclude. Flipkart is currently offering a 10 percent instant discount on Axis Bank and ICICI Bank credit and debit cards.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale to End on This Date: Here Are the Best Deals That You Can Grab Before They Vanish

description: Hades has quickly reached over 100,000 concurrent players on Steam after its version 1.0 launch on September 25. The roguelike action game is currently available on PC, Nintendo Switch, and Switch 2. Hades 2 has also become the year's highest rated game on Metacritic.
title: Hades 2 Crosses 100,000 Concurrent Players on Steam After Version 1.0 Launch

description: Instagram is testing a Reels-first layout in its mobile apps in India, the company confirmed Monday. A small group of users will see the app open directly to the Reels tab, with Stories placed on top. The design, similar to Instagram’s new iPad app, highlights Reels’ growing popularity and simplifies access to favourite features.
title: Instagram Is Testing a Reels-First Layout on Mobile Apps in India

description: Qatar National Bank (QNB) has integrated JPMorgan’s Kinexys Digital Payments platform to process US dollar corporate transactions in minutes. The platform offers 24/7 settlement, handling billions daily, and signalling growing institutional adoption of blockchain. Analysts say this move strengthens confidence in digital assets like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Chainlink, marking a major step in the global shift towards blockchain-powered finance.
title: Qatar National Bank Adopts JPMorgan’s Blockchain Platform for Instant US Dollar Payments

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra was launched by the South Korean tech giant globally in January 2025. However, specifications and features of its alleged successor, the Galaxy S26 Ultra, have been surfacing online for a while. Recently, the rumoured Samsung flagship phone was spotted with a “Private Display” feature in the One UI 8.5 software version. The handset is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Display, Camera and Other Key Specifications Leaked

description: Bitcoin started the week steady near $112,000 (roughly Rs. 99.4 lakh) as traders braced for a $22.6 billion (roughly Rs. 2,00,416 crore) futures expiry and key macroeconomic cues. Ethereum rose to $4,113 (roughly Rs. 3.65 lakh), aided by reduced exchange supply and whale accumulation. Altcoins posted modest gains, while analysts noted consolidation and investor caution.
title: Ethereum Climbs Above $4,100 as Whale Accumulation Boosts Market Sentiment

description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is currently one of the hottest smartphones that is available for the lowest price in the country on Amazon. The e-commerce platform is offering biggest price drop on the previous year's flagship smartphone. Here are the five reasons why you should consider the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra during the Amazon Great Indian Festival sale.
title: Five Reasons Why Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is The Biggest Deal of 2025 During Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale

description: Honor has teased key specifications of its upcoming MagicPad 3 Pro ahead of its China launch on October 16. The tablet is confirmed to be powered by Qualcomm's new Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. It will run on MagicOS 10 and support cross-device connectivity with Android, iOS, and HarmonyOS devices. It is tipped to be available in three colourways, and will pack a 12,540mAh battery.
title: Honor MagicPad 3 Pro to Feature 12,540mAh Battery and Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chip, Tipster Claims

description: Realme GT 8 series will launch in China next month. The Realme GT 8 Pro is teased to come with a detachable rear camera module, allowing users to swap based on their preference. Additionally, Realme GT 8 was spotted on the benchmarking website Geekbench, revealing its key specifications like Android 16, 16GB RAM, and Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro to Sport Swappable Camera Module; Realme GT 8 With Snapdragon 8 Elite Benchmarked

description: SanDisk on Monday launched its Creator Series storage lineup in India, targeting content creators. The range includes microSD and SD UHS-II cards, high-speed USB-C drives, a MagSafe-compatible SSD for iPhone, and a Phone Drive. Buyers also get a trial of Adobe Lightroom or Creative Cloud. The devices are optimised for video, AI, and creative workflows.
title: Sandisk Launches Creator Series Storage Devices in India: Price and Specifications

description: Sony WH-1000XM6 wireless headphones have launched in India. The over-ear headphones come equipped with 30mm driver units and support intuitive touch controls. They have 12 microphones and are claimed to deliver up to 40 hours of playback time on a single charge. The headphones are released in Black, Platinum Silver and Midnight Blue colour options.
title: Sony WH-1000XM6 Wireless Headphones Finally Launched in India With ANC, Up to 40 Hours of Battery Life
The Future of Laptops Is Here: Windows 11 Copilot Plus PCs

description: There are several deals on 1.5 Ton ACs from popular brands during the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale. A 1.5 Ton Split AC often proves to be a safe bet for most homes, considering its affordable price, budget, and the available space for installation. Eligible customers can take advantage of additional benefits, including exchange deals and bank offers, during the Amazon Great Indian Festival sale.
title: Amazon Sale: Top Deals on 1.5 Ton Air Conditioners from Daikin, Panasonic, Lloyd, and More

description: Zoho has launched Arattai, a new instant-messaging app targeting India’s vernacular audience. The name means “casual talk” in Tamil. Like WhatsApp, it supports chats, media sharing, audio and video calls, stories, channels, and even business accounts. A web version is also available, making it a full-fledged alternative to the Meta-owned platform.
title: Arattai Explained: What Is This WhatsApp Rival and Who Developed It - All You Need to Know

description: EA is said to be in "advanced talks" over a $50 billion buyout deal to go private. The company is reportedly in talks with a group of investors, including Saudi Arabia's PIF, Silver Lake
title: EA Reportedly in 'Advanced Talks' With Investors Over $50 Billion Buyout Deal to Go Private

description: Realme 15 Pro 5G debuted in India in July. Now, the company has teased that it will soon launch a special variant of the phone, dubbed Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Limited Edition. The pricing of this variant is presently unknown. The company offers the handset in three colourways and four storage options. It is powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, coupled with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 512GB of built-in storage.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Edition India Launch Teased: Expected Price, Specifications

description: Vivo has announced the preview programme for OriginOS 6 --- its upcoming Android 16-based firmware. It is initially being made available for the Vivo X200 Pro and iQOO 13, enabling eligible customers to experience all of the new features before the OS is publicly released. They will get access to a refreshed user interface (UI), improved customisation options, and new features backed by artificial intelligence (AI).
title: Vivo Announces OriginOS 6 Preview Program for Vivo X200 Pro and iQOO 13: How to Apply

description: YouTube Premium is the video streaming platform’s flagship subscription in India, which is priced at Rs. 1,490 per year. Now, the company is offering a more affordable plan for users in the country, dubbed YouTube Premium Lite. According to the company, “most” videos will be ad-free for subscribers from categories including gaming, fashion, beauty, and more.
title: YouTube Premium Lite Subscription Launched in India With Limited Ad-Free Video Playback, Lower Cost: Price, Benefits

description: Oppo Find X9 series is scheduled to be unveiled in mid-October, comprising the Find X9 and Find X9 Pro. The specifications of the two smartphones have been surfacing online for a while. On top of this, the company has already confirmed that the lineup will be powered by the latest MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset. Now, a tipster has shared some display and camera specifications of the upcoming smartphone series.
title: Oppo Find X9 Display, Camera Specifications Leaked Ahead of October Launch

description: Samsung introduced the ability to shoot Log video with the Galaxy S25 series. Now, with One UI 8.5, Samsung is reportedly adding built-in LUT (Look-Up Table) profiles directly within the stock video editor. This feature will allow users to apply cinematic colour grading to their footage. It is expected to debut with the Galaxy S26 Ultra.
title: Samsung's One UI 8.5 Update May Simplify Log Video Editing With Five LUT Profiles

description: Apple plans to introduce M5-powered MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models. As per a seasoned journalist, the products are expected to enter mass production soon. Alongside, the company is gearing up to unveil two new external Mac monitors. However, the new MacBook models may not be launched during the October event, owing to supply-chain issues.
title: Apple’s M5-Powered MacBook Pro, Air Models Reported to Enter Mass Production Soon; Launch Slated for 2026

description: OnePlus 15 will come in a Sand Dune colourway. As per the company, the handset will feature an aerospace-grade nano-ceramic metal mid-frame, which is lighter yet stronger than titanium. OnePlus claims it will have an “Ice Skin” feel, which is cold and pleasant to touch. Along with the Sand Dune colourway, the handset will introduce a new design texture called Quenching Texture.
title: OnePlus 15 Sand Dune Colourway Revealed With ‘Minimalist’ Camera Deco, 1.15mm Narrow Bezels
